title: Razer DeathAdder Left Hand completely screws up my clicking in-game, help?
body:
Right-click and left-click have been inverted. I have no knowledge on how to change this; I've tried adjusting every setting possible in both Windows and the Razer app and nothing works.
When I try to bind in-game, my left-click is "MB2" but my right-click does nothing. Please help.

replies.body:
Let's see if we can sort this out together. There is a list of steps I'd like you to try, they may seem lengthy, but I'm confident they will resolve this.

First, I'd like you to log into League, then hop into your installation folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the folder called **Config**.

Next, you'll want to hop into a custom match, then go back to your League directory and hop into the Config folder. There will be a file called **persistedsettings.json**. Delete this file. 

While still inside the Config folder, open the **input.ini** file with wordpad or any text editor. *Delete* all text within this document, then paste the following block of text in its entirety within this document.

> [GameEvents]
evtPlayerSelectClick = [Button 2]
evtPlayerMoveClick = [Button 1]
evtPlayerAttackMoveClick = [Shift] [Button 1]
evtPetMoveClick = [Alt] [Button 1]
evtPetReturn = [Alt] [Button 2]
[HUDEvents]
evtOnUIMouse1 = [Button 2]
evtOnUIMouse2 = [Button 1]
evtOnUIMouse3 = [Button 3]
evntHudMoveableSelect = [Button 2]
evtOrbitCamera = [Ctrl][Button 2]

**Save** the changes, then leave the custom match and close League out completely. Log back into League, then hop into a custom match to see if your mouse buttons work as you'd like them to.

I hope this helps, sorry for the block of text, but it was necessary. :P
It worked for me, thank you.
